description: [Scattered Spider](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1015) has used multifactor authentication (MFA) fatigue by sending repeated MFA authentication requests to targets.(Citation: CrowdStrike Scattered Spider BYOVD January 2023)

external_references.description: CrowdStrike. (2023, January 10). SCATTERED SPIDER Exploits Windows Security Deficiencies with Bring-Your-Own-Vulnerable-Driver Tactic in Attempt to Bypass Endpoint Security. Retrieved July 5, 2023.
